summary: BuildRequest contains no stated requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff implements multiple new backend and frontend behaviors (user profiles with access control, display-name gating, signup/auth flow changes, and SPA/deep-link support) that are not traceable to any explicit request in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend user profile storage with permission checks (save/view/delete) using AccessControl state and MixinAuthorization.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest, but new authorization and profile CRUD logic was added.

hallucinated_features.description: Post-auth display name gating UI that prompts new accounts to set/skip display name and navigates to /onboarding, using session flags.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest, but a new gate component and related flow behavior were added.

hallucinated_features.description: Signup page auth-flow changes including new attempt phases, backend profile check integration, and setting a 'new account' session flag to drive display-name prompting.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest, but signup/auth flow logic was modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Application-wide integration of PostAuthDisplayNameGate via RootLayout (as described in summaries).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest, but global layout behavior was changed to include display-name prompting.

hallucinated_features.description: SPA/deep-linking support via a 404.html redirect fallback (as described in summaries).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified in the BuildRequest, but deployment/hosting behavior was modified to handle 404 deep links.
